labels.label: Определение количества записей в таблице templates, чтобы понять грузить ли все templates или только изменённые (если 0, то Full Initial Load, иначе Update конкретные )
Загрузка в templates обновлений и удаление старых версий

processors.name: If rows need to be updated

entry.value: insert into publish.templates_new select mcode, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'xml_template' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) xml_template, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'xsd_scheme' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) xsd_scheme, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'excel_template' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) excel_template, max(version), coalesce (max(write_ts),now()) from publish.stg_templates st group by mcode;

select mcode, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'xml_template' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) xml_template, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'xsd_scheme' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) xsd_scheme, (select byte_content from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION by mcode) rownum, a.byte_content from publish.stg_templates a where a.content_type = 'excel_template' and a.mcode = st.mcode) q where rownum=1) excel_template, max(version), coalesce (max(write_ts),now()) from publish.stg_templates st where mcode in ( -- если после initial load пришёл mcode, которого ещё не было select distinct st.mcode from publish.stg_templates st where st.mcode not in (select mcode from publish.templates_new) union --изменённые существующие mcode (with stg as (select distinct on (mcode) mcode, version from publish.stg_templates st order by mcode) select mcode from publish.templates_new t where exists (select 1 from stg where coalesce(stg.version, '1900-01-01 12:00:00'::timestamp) != coalesce(t."version", '1900-01-01 13:00:00'::timestamp) and stg.mcode = t.mcode)) ) group by mcode;

processors.name: ExecuteSQL (What rows was updated on src)
